attributes.action: create an international standard for the colour coding of crisp packets according to flavour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is currently no standard, international or otherwise that governs the colour coding of crisp packets according to the flavour of the contents.  This can cause confusion and distress particularly where chees & onion and salt & vinegar flavours are concerned.  We believe the colours used should be clarified and made compulsory for all manufacturers of fried potato snacks

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
